snippet.title: Goosebumps: Escape from Horrorland (1996) PC Playthrough- NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A beginning to end playthrough of DreamWorks Interactive's 1996 Windows 95 game, R. L. Stine Goosebumps: Escape from Horrorland.

Recorded directly from a Windows 95 PC. This was a pretty neat game that my parents got for us as kids. Someone requested a playthrough of it, and I still have the original discs, so I figured why not?

I had forgotten how much fun this actually was. I had also completely forgotten that it has Jeff Goldblum playing Dracula, acting kinda pervy with the 12 year old girl.

I loved the books as a kid, and the game was a pretty entertaining, surprisingly high budget interactive movie with some hilariously bad costumes. Hope you enjoy watching it as much as I enjoyed reliving the memories of it :)

For my playthrough of the followup to this game, Goosebumps: Attack of the Mutant, follow this link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vQ0qBVhjME
____________
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!
